entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Hopedale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hopedale 12:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -15.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
